# fitted(to:eventHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Fits a transformer to a sequence of examples.

## Declaration

```swift
func fitted<S>(to input: S, eventHandler: EventHandler?) async throws -> Self.Transformer where S : Sequence, S.Element == Self.Transformer.Input
```

## Parameters

- **input**: A sequence of examples.
- **eventHandler**: An event handler.

## Return Value

The fitted transformer.

## Fitting and adapting

- **adaptedAsSupervised(annotationType:)**: Exposes this estimator as a supervised estimator.
- **adaptedAsTemporal()**: Exposes this estimator as a temporal estimator.
- **fitted(to:)**

items.description: Exposes this estimator as a supervised estimator.
items.name: adaptedAsSupervised(annotationType:)

items.description: Exposes this estimator as a temporal estimator.
